data.actual_result: You see a permissions integer that you are able to copy.
data.expected_result: You should see  a url to copy at the bottom, as per "Pick the permissions your bot needs to work and copy the URL below."
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Type error in Bot Permissions panel in an application.
data.steps_to_repro: - Visit the Discord Developer Portal - Create an app - Create a bot - Scroll down to "Bot Permissions" -
